title: Heroku Deployment Preparation
description: Prepare Farkle Dice for Heroku hosting with PostgreSQL addon. The app will be called 'farkledice' and use Heroku Postgres Mini plan. Skip Redis for now. Work on current branch (modernization/phase-1).

requirements.detail: Parse Heroku's DATABASE_URL environment variable format (postgres://user:pass@host:port/dbname)
Update database configuration to support both local (docker) and production (Heroku) environments
Remove Redis addon from app.json (not needed initially)
Create database migration script to initialize Heroku PostgreSQL with schema
Configure session handling for production environment (Heroku has ephemeral filesystem)
Set up Apache/PHP configuration for proper routing in production
Document Heroku deployment process (app creation, database migration, configuration)
Ensure Smarty template compilation works on Heroku's ephemeral filesystem

tasks.description: Update dbutil.php to parse DATABASE_URL and support both local and Heroku environments
Update FarkleConfig class to handle environment-based configuration
Create database migration script for Heroku PostgreSQL setup
Configure session storage for Heroku environment
Create Apache configuration for proper routing in production
Create HEROKU.md with complete deployment instructions
Update Smarty configuration for Heroku's ephemeral filesystem
[ORCHESTRATOR] Final verification - verify all requirements are satisfied
tasks.note: This task is completed by the Orchestrator, NOT a coder agent
